meanings.definition: To set or establish boundaries or limits.
meanings.sent1: The fence demarks the edge of the garden.
meanings.sent2: She carefully demarks the area for the new playground.
meanings.sent3: The chalk line demarks where the treasure is buried!
meanings.sent4: The river demarks the border between the two kingdoms.
meanings.sent5: The sign demarks the start of the hiking trail.

meanings.definition: To indicate or show the limits or boundaries of something.
meanings.sent1: The sign demarks the entrance to the park.
meanings.sent2: His speech clearly demarks his stance on the issue.
meanings.sent3: The dotted line demarks the path to follow in the maze.
meanings.sent4: The mountain range demarks the horizon in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The map demarks the different regions with colored lines.
